casebody.data:
Alec WHITTAKER, Plaintiff
v.
Robert W. TODD d/b/a Southern Interiors, Defendant. No. 163P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Malcolm E. Whittaker, Houston, TX, for Alec Whittaker. Robert W. Tood, Pro Se. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 625 S.E.2d 860 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 28th day of March 2006 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006."
